coverage_details.dental_general: Dental Clean, twice per year for all scheme
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: SR 100,000.00 (including early screening cost for newborn disability)
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00 (Covered for all ages. Age limit from 0 to 999)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services, except where service has limits (such as dental, hearing aids, optical, kidney assistance, pregnancy, etc). Pre-approval needed for specified exceptions.
coverage_details.special_instructions: VIP Medication Limit is equal to pre-authorization limit. Transportation of mortal remains SR 15,000. Optical benefit is covered for all ages. Frame limit is same as optical limit. Rehabilitation Treatment, Congenital, Neonatal Care from Day 1, Physiotherapy, Hearing & Visual Aids, Vaccination, Pre-existing and Chronic Conditions are covered. Artificial Limbs, Prosthesis & Medical Equipment are covered. Cast, Splints, Tresses and Crutches are covered. Irregular Cycles, Osteoporosis, and all menopause physiological changes are covered. Flexi-pen Fills covered for VIP if prescribed. No age limit for employees. Organ transplant covered including Knee replacement. Style Libre, Free style sensor covered for 4 cases. Dental Clean, twice per year for all scheme.
